description:
syscall, runtime: Plan 9: use nanotime syscall on amd64

Separates the implementation of nanotime on 64-bit
version of Plan 9 from that on the 32-bit version.
The former uses a syscall.

syscall, runtime: Plan 9: use nanotime syscall on amd64

Separates the implementation of nanotime on 64-bit
version of Plan 9 from that on the 32-bit version.
The former uses a syscall.
